titleStmt.title: A discouerie of the manifold corruptions of the Holy Scriptures by the heretikes of our daies specially the English sectaries, and of their foule dealing herein, by partial & false translations to the aduantage of their heresies, in their English Bibles vsed and authorised since the time of schisme. By Gregory Martin one of the readers of diuinitie in the English College of Rhemes.
titleStmt.author: Martin, Gregory, d. 1582.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A discouerie of the hæret. translations of the Bible.
The three final leaves contain a table and errata.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
